message:
Properly handle system image shipped via platform

Some older android version ship the systme image
via the platform (e.g. < 10, 12, 13), handle those
versions correctly.

added: installPlatform(logger, launcher, sdk, platform, emuConfig.getTargetAbi(), skipSystemImageInstall);
deleted: installPlatform(logger, launcher, sdk, platform, abi, emuConfig.isNamedEmulator());
